original_text: And thou shalt anoint the tabernacle of the congregation therewith, and the ark of the testimony,

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt anoint the tabernacle of the congregation therewith,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 회중의 장막을 그것으로 기름 부으실 것입니다,

sentences.original_text: and the ark of the testimony,
